name: Fusion Frenzy
description:
This is a game that we made for Kiwijam 2019 that is inspired by the Chernobyl crisis. It's about managing a nuclear power plant so that it does not melt down or losing power. 

This game was made by Team Uranium.

Artists: Ghan Satjipanon & Kotaro Yamada

Musician: Mitch Lemmings

Programmer: Jacob Dewse
